product_name: New Balance Minimus 1010v2 Trail-Running Shoes - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The New Balance WT1010v2 Minimus Trail-Running Shoes for men combine a smooth, minimalist ride with additional midsole support to protect against rocky, uneven trails. Thermoplastic urethane shanks offer greater structure and underfoot support than most minimalist shoes. 4mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. Nylon mesh uppers with polyurethane overlays provide lightweight comfort and support. Polyester/nylon linings wick perspiration away from your feet and then dry quickly so your feet stay cool, comfortable and odor-free. WT1010v2 Minimus Trail-Running Shoes feature EVA midsoles for superb flexibility and a featherweight cushion. Vibram rubber outsoles provide lightweight performance without compromising grip or stability; updated lugs on medial sides increase traction. Closeout.
short_description: The New Balance WT1010v2 Minimus Trail-Running Shoes for men combine a smooth, minimalist ride with additional midsole support to protect against rocky, uneven trails.
